list.text:
Party Theme: Nordic NoÃ«l
For a new take on the classic holiday, go Scandinavian. Set the scene with a smorgasbord of tree trimmings and easy homespun touches in red, white and wheat.

Tree of Plenty
Glue together a star ornament in minutes using wheat reeds, wooden craft shapes and a red marker. Hang a fabric caribou and cross-stitched embroidery hoops using these tutorials.

Reindeer Games
Fill in a wreath with Santa's favorite pal. To create this playful Rudolph, cut up a couple of corrugated boxes using our tutorial.

Bedecked Bannister
Step up the entryway by embellishing a fresh-cut or fake garland. After draping greenery along the mantel or handrail, add berry branches and traditional straw ornaments.
